CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )), 1, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".01 ", 2, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".02 ", 3, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".03 ", 4, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".04 ", 5, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".05 ", 6, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".06 ", 7, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".07 ", 8, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".08 ", 9, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".09 ", 10, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".10 ", 11, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".11 ", 12, TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))) + ".12 ", NULL )
CustomField.label: OpenDate
